titles.title: A resolution tendering the thanks of the Senate to the President pro tempore for the courteous, dignified, and impartial manner in which he has presided over the deliberations of the Senate.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 10/22/1988--Introduced. Thanks the Honorable John C. Stennis, President pro tempore, for the manner in which he presided over the Senate during the second session of the 100th Congress.
